name: The Lost Isle (Working name) - Dev Demo
name_original: The Lost Isle (Working name) - Dev Demo
description:
A currently in development puzzle platformer set in a mystical lost realm; there isn't a whole lot of properly developed story behind this game. It just started as a small concept for a school project, but I liked it enough to start developing it more.

I plan to use a lot of puzzling and discovery of things in this game. As of now, I don't plan on implementing any sort of combat in this game. This is just a world to explore, solve puzzles and discover cool things (creatures, plants, locations, etc.)

This is my first time making a game like this so it will probably take a lot of learning to make something good but I appreciate as much feedback as possible both good and bad :D
